message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm offering it at $11,500. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses lower. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your desire to be cost-conscious, however, the value this product brings is substantial.  I could meet you halfway from our previous offers. How about $10,750?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I still feel that we might be able to find common ground. I am willing to pay $10,500 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to come down slightly to $10,600.  I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am glad we are getting closer. I am willing to pay $10,550 for the product.
